subject: Revised concurrency patches for junit 4.7
msgSnippet: If you need to run any sort of CI environment with parallel tests you re still going to be needing the patches described in this issue:
messageBody:
If you need to run any sort of CI environment with parallel tests you're still going to be needing the patches described in this issue:

http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues#issue/16

There is a 4.7 fork with these patches available at http://github.com/krosenvold/junit/tree/concurrenycfixes

or you can just apply the git patch file from http://github.com/krosenvold/spring-framework-concurrent-junit-patch/blob/a98e7c0dc140c74566c3aba8f03ac7d769758ab8/junit47ConcurrencyProblems.patch

(The original patches that were made for this were a bit clumsy in terms of git-ness, but my git-fu is growing stronger)

Kristian Rosenvold
